[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 04 - Bilanz but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:LoansAndAdvancesToBanks, ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:LoansAndAdvancesToCustomers All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
